name: Pally Live Video Chat & Talk to Strangers for Free
description: Pally Live is the best random video app for Live video chat with strangers using video call. Connect over random video chat with with just a swipe. Make every live video chat fun by sending gifts, using face filters  Explore and make live video chat with strangers from over 190 countries! Pally is fun and interesting, it helps you to live chat and lie talk with boys and girls in real time.  Some interesting features are   Live Video Chat and Call:  Get matched with random boys and girls around the world for free random video chat.  Make free video chat using Pally in a jiffy and meet new people  Talk to Strangers:  Make live video chat using your phone anytime and anywhere.  Initiate live chat using this video calling app and show connect with strangers Random chat with boys and girls across the world and start a live talk with them for FREE   Free Video Calls: You can have free video call with your friends.  You could have either video call or text chat at anytime and anywhere for FREE!   Chat History:  Privately keep your chat history with the video calling app. Chat with strangers of your recent live video chat   Easy Sign up: You can easily sign up on this video calling app using your Facebook , Google or phone number Quickly use the app for a seamless video chat with strangers   Instant Messaging:  You can live chat while live video call is on. Continue the chat without the video call too You can also instant message to strangers who havent connected as a friend from your video call history  Video Filters: coming soon Add various video filters and stickers to your live stream, so that live video chat is more fun. Use Face video filters and add masks while on the live video chat based on events etc  With this video calling app you can have live chat, live call to meet strangers. Choose many filters like country or gender to initiate random video chat to talk to strangers and meet new people. Start video chat and have lessons with your language teacher in one on one video chat rooms  If you have come so far and liked our app please review us.
